As a user, I want a well-designed login page that allows me to securely log into my account.

Acceptance Criteria

UI Requirements
The login page should have a modern and responsive design.
The background should have a subtle gradient or light blur effect.
A centered login form with a card-style UI.
🔑 Input Fields
Email Field

Placeholder text: "Enter your email"
Displays an error message if the email format is incorrect.
Autofocus on this field when the page loads.
Password Field

Placeholder text: "Enter your password"
A show/hide password toggle icon.
Displays an error message if the password is incorrect.
🎯 Buttons and Links
Login Button

Label: "Login"
Disabled until both fields are filled.
Shows a loading spinner when clicked.
Forgot Password? Link

Clicking this navigates to the password recovery page.
Don't have an account? Sign Up

Clicking this navigates to the sign-up page.
